other_tests.findings: Mildly echogenic liver concerning for fatty infiltration; no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilatation; common bile duct measures 8 mm; mild gallbladder wall edema and multiple gallstones; gallstones seen at the gallbladder neck; negative ___ sonographic sign; main portal vein patent; evaluation of the pancreas suboptimal due to overlapping bowel gas.
